channel.title: Comments for Doubtful News
channel.description: A sharp-eyed view on questionable claims

item.title: Comment on Child’s Play: Charlie Charlie Challenge is same old same old… by Lagaya1
item.dc:creator: Lagaya1
item.description: So many new voices here today. Are they all the same person, or have they been sent here by someone? Very unusual to see so many that are not recognized. And so many that are credulous. Not the usual crowd at all. Overall that's a good thing. Every new person that's introduced to critical thinking and learns from it is a win.
item.content:encoded: So many new voices here today. Are they all the same person, or have they been sent here by someone? Very unusual to see so many that are not recognized. And so many that are credulous. Not the usual crowd at all. Overall that’s a good thing. Every new person that’s introduced to critical thinking and learns from it is a win.

item.title: Comment on Child’s Play: Charlie Charlie Challenge is same old same old… by idoubtit
item.dc:creator: idoubtit
item.description:
Oh dear. Please go to http://practicalskepticism.com And try reading a little more closely before coming along and mouthing off.
Also, you might want to read up on poltergeists, many are clearly fakes.
item.content:encoded:
Oh dear. Please go to http://practicalskepticism.com And try reading a little more closely before coming along and mouthing off.

Also, you might want to read up on poltergeists, many are clearly fakes.

item.title: Comment on Child’s Play: Charlie Charlie Challenge is same old same old… by idoubtit
item.dc:creator: idoubtit
item.description: Evidence is needed for such an EXTRAORDINARY claim as real magic and harm caused by it. I fail to see any of that in your post; this is your personal ideology, unsupported.
item.content:encoded: Evidence is needed for such an EXTRAORDINARY claim as real magic and harm caused by it. I fail to see any of that in your post; this is your personal ideology, unsupported.

item.title: Comment on Child’s Play: Charlie Charlie Challenge is same old same old… by Ohdear
item.dc:creator: Ohdear
item.description: I'm sorry but that video doesn't 'prove' that all of the videos are fake. That's like saying poltergeist is fake because I can pick up a rock and throw it just like a demon can. Your conclusions, quite frankly, have a few leaps in logic.
item.content:encoded: I’m sorry but that video doesn’t ‘prove’ that all of the videos are fake. That’s like saying poltergeist is fake because I can pick up a rock and throw it just like a demon can. Your conclusions, quite frankly, have a few leaps in logic.

item.title: Comment on What happened to the dinosaurs? They are used to indoctrinate children by idoubtit
item.dc:creator: idoubtit
item.description: This story has been picked up (sans credit) on other websites. But, you heard it here first. (Actually, it was on my twitter first but thanks to our tipster David! Cracking good find!)
item.content:encoded: This story has been picked up (sans credit) on other websites. But, you heard it here first. (Actually, it was on my twitter first but thanks to our tipster David! Cracking good find!)

item.title: Comment on Siren sound sparks speculation in Cheyenne by Rand
item.dc:creator: Rand
item.description:
House Alarm.
In my experience, most of them have sirens to alert the neighborhood that you forgot to turn it off when you decided to open a window, or decided to take the trash out, or get something from the garage after the wife turned it on for the night. Very Loud.
item.content:encoded:
House Alarm.

In my experience, most of them have sirens to alert the neighborhood that you forgot to turn it off when you decided to open a window, or decided to take the trash out, or get something from the garage after the wife turned it on for the night. Very Loud.

item.title: Comment on The birthday party “rain of poop” story. Don’t assume. by Rand
item.dc:creator: Rand
item.description:
I'd target my investigations at the girl's peers.... see who's snickering the loudest in school the next day...
As far as bird doo-doo goes.. When I grew up we raised chickens. The food may have went in dry, but what came out the other end was decidely not. And we had our share of Canadian geese who nested around our lake. And pooped all over our lawn. Constantly. It was not dry until it had been baking in the sun for a while. Yuck.
item.content:encoded:
I’d target my investigations at the girl’s peers…. see who’s snickering the loudest in school the next day…

As far as bird doo-doo goes.. When I grew up we raised chickens. The food may have went in dry, but what came out the other end was decidely not. And we had our share of Canadian geese who nested around our lake. And pooped all over our lawn. Constantly. It was not dry until it had been baking in the sun for a while. Yuck.

item.title: Comment on Child’s Play: Charlie Charlie Challenge is same old same old… by John Parker
item.dc:creator: John Parker
item.description: Actually, I have seen FIRST HAND the dangers of "spirit Boards/Ouija" and other similar spirit divination methods dependent on the spirit moving an object. Weather it is a subconscious acting out, latent Psychokinesis, or trickery, the danger of harm is real. Be it stage magic, Pagan Magik or "paranormal challenge", harm can happen. There is a psychiatric theory that "Possession" is misbehavior subconsciously permitted by superstitious belief. So real, delusional, or, peer driven hallucination, "Possession" could happen.
item.content:encoded: Actually, I have seen FIRST HAND the dangers of “spirit Boards/Ouija” and other similar spirit divination methods dependent on the spirit moving an object. Weather it is a subconscious acting out, latent Psychokinesis, or trickery, the danger of harm is real. Be it stage magic, Pagan Magik or “paranormal challenge”, harm can happen. There is a psychiatric theory that “Possession” is misbehavior subconsciously permitted by superstitious belief. So real, delusional, or, peer driven hallucination, “Possession” could happen.

item.title: Comment on Mass animal deaths reported; fringe sites panic over headlines by Casie
item.dc:creator: Casie
item.description: That is crazy! Not on this wide scale! To say you know why this has (and still is) happened! you don't know!! You think u know! but the truth is...no one knows!!! That is why there are so many who want to explain it but none can! People have their theories but nothing with proof!
item.content:encoded: That is crazy! Not on this wide scale! To say you know why this has (and still is) happened! you don’t know!! You think u know! but the truth is…no one knows!!! That is why there are so many who want to explain it but none can! People have their theories but nothing with proof!

item.title: Comment on Mass animal deaths reported; fringe sites panic over headlines by Casie
item.dc:creator: Casie
item.description: No one can be certain what it is and majority if not all is speculation so therefore it's mysterious mass amount of animal deaths happening on a huge scale- all over the world and its not only affecting a few! It's in some cases millions!! that it is concerning!! It's no wonder people have thought this could be supernatural
item.content:encoded: No one can be certain what it is and majority if not all is speculation so therefore it’s mysterious mass amount of animal deaths happening on a huge scale- all over the world and its not only affecting a few! It’s in some cases millions!! that it is concerning!! It’s no wonder people have thought this could be supernatural
